entries.name: "Gundark" Scav-Suit
entries.description:
[H3]"Gundark" Scav-Suit[h3] Please see page 56 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 56 - Rise of the Separatists[h4]
Adds [BO][BO] to checks to avoid adverse effects of cold temperatures.
Removes [SE] imposed by cold-weather conditions on Perception checks.

entries.name: "Storm" Charge Suit
entries.description:
[H3]Corellian Arms "Storm" Charge Suit[h3] Please see page 50 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 50 - Dangerous Covenants[h4]
If attack against armor generates [TH][TH], attacker is disoriented for 1 round.
If attack against armor generates [DE], attacker is automatically hit for 8 damage.
Counts as being equipped with shock gloves

entries.name: A/KT Mountaineer Armor
entries.description:
[H3]A/KT Mountaineer Armor[h3] Please see page 45 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 45 - Enter the Unknown[h4]
Grants [BOOST][BOOST] to all Athletics skill checks made to climb or rappel

entries.name: A/KT Shockrider Crash Suit
entries.description:
[H3]A/KT Shockrider Crash Suit[h3] Please see page 45 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook, or page 42 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook, for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 45 - Enter the Unknown[h4][H4]Page 42 - Stay on Target[h4]
Reduces strain received from Critical Hits to the wearer's vehicle by 1 (min 1).
Reduce damage from fires and weapons with the Burn quality by 1.

entries.name: A/KT Tracker Utility Vest
entries.description:
[H3]A/KT Tracker Utility Vest[h3] Please see page 45 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 45 - Enter the Unknown[h4]
Increases Encumbrance Threshold Mod - Increase Encumbrance Threshold by 1 Compte 2

entries.id: A/KT Wing Commander Armored Flight Suit
entries.name: A/KT Wing Commander Armored Flight Suit
entries.description:
[H3]A/KT Wing Commander Armored Flight Suit[h3] Please see page 42 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 42 - Stay on Target[h4]
Reduces strain received from Critical Hits to the wearer's vehicle by 1 (min 1).
Reduce damage from fires and weapons with the Burn quality by 1.

entries.name: Tenue d'exploration
entries.description:
Ceux qui s'aventurent loin des mondes civilisés devraient se méfier et emmener de quoi affronter les climats hostiles. Lorsqu'on se rend dans les désert arides, l'équipement standard comprend en général de grands robes, des visières polarisées, des turbans, des packs réfrigérants et des recycleurs d'eau. POur les voyages sur les planètes glaciaires, il inclut vêtements isolants, casque chauffé, lunettes de protection et pantalon matelassé.

/n

Un personnage qui possède une tenue d'exploration appropriée à un environement hostile particulier ignore un dé d'infortune [SE] imposé par les mauvaises conditions climatiques.

entries.name: Alliance Engineer's Helmet and Vest
entries.description:
[H3]Alliance Engineer's Helmet and Vest[h3]
      Please see page 42 of the Fully Operational Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 42 - Fully Operational[h4]

entries.name: Alliance Light Stealth Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Alliance Light Stealth Armor[h3]
      Please see page 49 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Forged in Battle[h4]

entries.name: Ancient Battle Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Ancient Battle Armor[h3] Please see page 47 of the Knights of Fate Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Knights of Fate[h4]
Increase Defense when Force User Mod - Increases Defense value by 1 when Force User

entries.name: AniPro Layered Beast Armor
entries.description:
[H3]VeTech AniPro Layered Beast Armor[h3] Please see page 44 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 44 - Savage Spirits[h4]
May only be worn by a beast.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

entries.name: Vêtements Renforcés
entries.description:
Cette catégorie d'armure regroupe les vestes légères et les pantalons renforcés de petites plaques de plastoïde ou de céramique. Parfois, elles sont recouvertes d'une ou deux épaisseurs de tissu supplémentaire capable de disperser l'énergie. Bien que léger, ce type d'armure protège les organes vitaux et s'avère presque indécelable, si la coupe en est suffisamment volumineuse. Il faut réussir un test de perception Moyen [DI][DI] pour remarquer que les vêtements d'un personnage sont renforcés.

Les plaques dissimulées dans l'étoffe protègent bien sûr au corps à corps, mais elles sont surtout capables de dévier les tirs d'armes énergétique visant les zones vitales.

entries.name: Armored Drop Suit
entries.description:
[H3]Armored Drop Suit[h3] Please see page 49 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details. [P][I]Note: A vehicle version of this armor exists with the same name.[i][P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - No Disintegrations[h4]
While conscious and flight systems are engaged, wearer cannot suffer falling damage.

entries.name: Armored Robes
entries.description:
[H3]Armored Robes[h3]
      Please see page 179 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 179 - Force and Destiny Core Rulebook[h4]

entries.name: Banal Apparel
entries.description:
[H3]Banal Apparel[h3] Please see page 47 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Desperate Allies[h4]
Opposing characters upgrade the difficulty of checks to identify wearer once.

entries.name: Beast-Hide Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Beast-Hide Armor[h3]
      Please see page 49 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook, or page 44 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook, for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Dangerous Covenants[h4][H4]Page 44 - Savage Spirits[h4]

entries.name: Biogel Suit
entries.description:
[H3]Biogel Suit[h3] Please see page 45 of the Disciples of Harmony Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 45 - Disciples of Harmony[h4]
Wearer gains +1 soak when hit by Brawl or bludgeoning Melee weapons.

entries.name: Blast Vest
entries.description:
[H3]Blast Vest[h3] Please see page 47 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Fly Casual[h4]
Armor gains +2 soak when wearer suffers damage from a slugthrower or other physical projectile.

entries.name: CF-9 Naval Flight Suit
entries.description:
[H3]CF-9 Naval Flight Suit[h3] Please see page 56 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 56 - Rise of the Separatists[h4]
Includes a built-in respirator.
Remove up to [SE] from Piloting checks added due to physical stress.

entries.name: Caballerin-Series Riding Tack
entries.description:
[H3]Caballerin-Series Riding Tack[h3] Please see page 42 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 42 - Stay on Target[h4]
May only be worn by a beast.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

entries.name: Capari-Series Padded Beast Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Capari-Series Padded Beast Armor[h3] Please see page 43 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 43 - Stay on Target[h4]
May only be worn by a beast.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

entries.name: Cargo Clothing
entries.description:
[H3]Cargo Clothing[h3] Please see page 47 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][I][P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Desperate Allies[h4]
Carry Items up to Encumbrance 1 Mod - Carry Items up to Encumbrance 1 Compte 3

entries.name: Veste de chasseur
entries.description:
La veste de chasseur est portée par de nombreux corelliens vivants aux marges de la légalité, et malgré son aspect tout à fait banal, elle a sauvé la vie de bien des marchands indépendants. Tissée de fibres denses capables de disperser partiellement l'énergie des blasters, elle est impossible à différencier des vêtements ordinaires et constitue donc un excellent choix pour quiconque souhaite bénéficier d'un surcrôit de protection sans que cela se sache.

Les vestes de chasseur ont une valeur d'encaissement de 2 contre les armes énergétique ; en revanche, cette valeur tombe à 1 contre tout autre type de dégâts.

Page 99 Livre Etoile de la providence

entries.name: Chitin Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Chitin Armor[h3]
      Please see page 45 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 45 - Savage Spirits[h4]

entries.name: Climbsuit
entries.description:
[H3]Ayelixe/Krongbing Climbsuit[h3] Please see page 41 of the Cyphers and Masks Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 41 - Cyphers and Masks[h4]
Upgrades the ability of checks to climb or rappel down a surface once.
Reduces damage and strain suffered from falling by 5.
Reduces Critical Injury results due to falling by 10..

entries.name: Cloaking Coat
entries.description:
[H3]Cloaking Coat[h3] Please see page 47 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Special Modifications[h4]
Upgrade difficulty of checks to detect an individual wearing a cloaking coat using sensors or electronics twice. Droids with Intellect less than wearer's ranks in Computers are similarly affected.

entries.name: Concealing Robes
entries.description:
[H3]Concealing Robes[h3] Please see page 179 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 179 - Force and Destiny Core Rulebook[h4]
Add [SETBACK] to checks to notice or recognize an individual wearing concealing robes.

entries.name: Crash Gear
entries.description:
[H3]Crash Gear[h3] Please see page 43 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 43 - Endless Vigil[h4]
Wearer ignores the effects of ongoing Critical Injuries on any Intellect- or Cunning-related checks, but still suffers from the injuries.

entries.name: Cresh "Luck" Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Cresh "Luck" Armor[h3]
      Please see page 47 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Keeping the Peace[h4]

entries.name: Destri-Series Laminated Beast Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Destri-Series Laminated Beast Armor[h3] Please see page 43 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 43 - Stay on Target[h4]
May only be worn by a beast.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

entries.name: Diplomat's Robes
entries.description:
[H3]Diplomat's Robes[h3] Please see page 47 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Desperate Allies[h4]
Add [BOOST] to social checks claiming diplomatic authority, accessing classified data, and bypassing normal protocol.

entries.name: EOD-Mk II Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Creshaldyne EOD-Mk II Armor[h3] Please see page 42 of the Fully Operational Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 42 - Fully Operational[h4]
Characters wearing this armor lose their free movement.

entries.name: Enviro-suit
entries.description:
[H3]Enviro-suit[h3] Please see page 44 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 44 - Enter the Unknown[h4]
Suffer [SETBACK] to any Agility- or Perception-based checks

entries.name: Fabricator's Protective Gear
entries.description:
[H3]Fabricator's Protective Gear[h3] Please see page 43 of the Fully Operational Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 43 - Fully Operational[h4]
Wearer ignores effects of fires or acides of rating 1 or 2.
Has soak 3 against damage from Blast quality.

entries.name: Flare Jacket
entries.description:
[H3]Flare Jacket[h3] Please see page 48 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Desperate Allies[h4]
Once per encounter, can trigger flare charge. Everyone in short range makes [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Vigilance check[b]. Fail means staggered for 1 round, plus 1 round per [TH][TH][TH].

entries.name: Formal Council Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Formal Council Armor[h3] Please see page 45 of the Disciples of Harmony Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 45 - Disciples of Harmony[h4]
When wearing, add [AD][AD] to negotiation checks against people who hold Jedi in high regard.
Optionally, when wearing, add [AD][AD] to Coercion checks against people who hate or fear the Jedi.

entries.name: G-Suit
entries.description:
[H3]G-Suit[h3] Please see page 44 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 44 - Endless Vigil[h4]
Wearer reduces strain cost to perfrom a second Pilot Only maneuver by 1.

entries.name: H-Series Megafauna Carriage
entries.description:
[H3]H-Series Megafauna Carriage[h3] Please see page 43 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 43 - Stay on Target[h4]
May only be worn by a beast.
Requires silhouette 3+ and Brawn 5+.
May ride a beast without suffering bareback penalty.

entries.name: HT-77 Cold Assault Armor
entries.description:
[H3]HT-77 Cold Assault Armor[h3] Please see page 57 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 57 - Rise of the Separatists[h4]
Comes with built-in comlink.
Adds [BO][BO] to checks to avoid adverse effects of cold temperatures.
Removes [SE] imposed by cold-weather conditions on Perception checks.

entries.name: Hauling Harness
entries.description:
[H3]Hauling Harness[h3] Please see page 48 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Desperate Allies[h4]
Increases Encumbrance Threshold Mod - Increase Encumbrance Threshold by 1 Compte 6

entries.name: Armure de Combat Lourde
entries.description:
Certains stormtroopers, chasseurs de primes ou droïdes portent des armures lourdes. Sans conteste capable de résister aux blasters standards, elles ont tout de même un peu de retard dans la course qui les oppose à la puissance des armes.

Les armures de combat lourdes peuvent être complétes, hermétique et offrir les mêmes avantages qu'une armure laminée, ou prendre la forme d'une veste lourde accompagnée d'un casque anti-explosion.

entries.name: Vêtements Epais
entries.description:
Une bonne veste en cuir, une combinaison de mécanicien ou un épais manteau en laine réduiront pas franchement les dégâts, mais c'est déjà mieux que rien. La plupart de ceux qui vivent aux frontières de l'Empire portent des vêtements épais au quotidien.

Page 132 du livre Aux confins de l'Empire pour plus de détails.

entries.name: Heavy Robes
entries.description:
[H3]Heavy Robes[h3]
      Please see page 56 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 56 - Rise of the Separatists[h4]

entries.name: Holographic Costume
entries.description:
[H3]Holographic Costume[h3] Please see page 48 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Desperate Allies[h4]
[B]Easy ([DI]) Computers check to record new garment, [B]Daunting ([DI][DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b] to record facsimile of garment.

entries.name: Hunter's Trophy Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Hunter's Trophy Armor[h3]
      Please see page 49 of the No Disintegrations Sourcebook for details.
      [P][I]Note:  If making your own suit from owned hides, price/rarity drops to 1000/6.[i][P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - No Disintegrations[h4]

entries.name: Hutt Shell Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Hutt Shell Armor[h3] Please see page 104 of the Lords of Nal Hutta Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 104 - Lords of Nal Hutta[h4]
May only be worn by a Hutt.
Allows wearer to hover up to five meters above the ground.
Allows wearer to ignore the affects of Awkward and Ponderous abilities.
Does not have to spend additional maneuvers when navigating difficult terrain.

entries.name: Imperial Hazard Trooper Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Imperial Hazard Trooper Armor[h3] Please see page 49 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Forged in Battle[h4]
Remove [SE][SE] due to darkness, smoke or similar environmental factors that obscure vision from the wearer's Perception, Vigilance, and combat checks.

entries.name: Imperial Storm Commando Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Imperial Storm Commando Armor[h3] Please see page 49 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Forged in Battle[h4]
Helmet is equipped with macrobinoculars, scanner goggles, and a comlink.
While wearing storm commando armor, a character removes [SE] due to darkness, smoke, or similar environmental factors that obscure vision from all Perception, Vigilance, and combat checks.
Adds [SE] to other characters' Perception checks to detect the wearer.

entries.name: Individual Field Disruptor
entries.description:
[H3]Individual Field Disruptor[h3] Please see page 45 of the Disciples of Harmony Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 45 - Disciples of Harmony[h4]
When in contact with another energy field, the field ceases to offer any defense.
When entering engaged range with a droid, the droid suffers 5 Stun damage.
When entering engaged range with an electronic device, the device becomes inactive for the rest of the encounter.

entries.name: Jedi Battle Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Jedi Battle Armor[h3] Please see page 47 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Keeping the Peace[h4]
Wearing Jedi Battle Armor fitted for someone else adds [SE][SE] to all combat checks.
Fitting to new wearer requires a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] and an hour to complete.

entries.name: Jedi Commander Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Jedi Commander Armor[h3]
      Please see page 57 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 57 - Rise of the Separatists[h4]

entries.name: Jedi Temple Guard Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Jedi Temple Guard Armor[h3] Please see page 48 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Keeping the Peace[h4]
Contains helmet comlink.
Contains integrated scanner.

entries.name: Jedi Training Suit (Unweighted)
entries.description:
[H3]Jedi Training Suit (Unweighted)[h3]
      Please see page 48 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Keeping the Peace[h4]

entries.name: Jedi Training Suit (Weighted)
entries.description:
[H3]Jedi Training Suit (Weighted)[h3] Please see page 48 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Keeping the Peace[h4]
Removing weights requires an [B]Easy ([DI]) Mechanics check[b].

entries.name: Karflo Thinsuit
entries.description:
[H3]Karflo Thinsuit[h3] Please see page 50 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 50 - Forged in Battle[h4]
Remove [SE][SE] from checks imposed by environment in which the user is currently operating.

entries.name: Kav-Dann Power Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Kav-Dann Power Armor[h3] Please see page 48 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Keeping the Peace[h4]
Remove [SE] caused by darkness, smoke, or other environmental factors that might affect vision from Perception, Vigilance, and Combat checks.
Gain [BO] to resist the effects of radiation.

entries.name: Koromondian Half-Vest
entries.description:
[H3]Koromondian Half-Vest[h3] Please see page 49 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Keeping the Peace[h4]
When wearer suffers Critical Injury, armor suffers minor damage, or increases current damage by one step.

entries.name: Armure Laminée (Armure des Stormtroopers)
entries.description: Les troupes de chocs impériales portent des armures laminées qui recouvrent le corps entier. Elles n'arrêteront jamais un tri direct de blaster, mais sont plutôt efficaces contre les souffles d'explosions et les shrapnels. En général, elles incluent aussi un système de visée longue portée et un comlink réglé sur la fréquence de l'unité. Ces armures étant conçues pour fonctionner avec de l'énergie, il est facile d'y installer des kits. Les combinaisons moulantes sur lesquelles sont fixées les pièces d'armure offrent un bon degré d'isolation contre les conditions climatiques. Il existe des variantes spécifiquement adaptées aux environnements extrêmes de certaines planètes.

entries.name: Lector's Outfit
entries.description:
[H3]Lector's Outfit[h3] Please see page 48 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Desperate Allies[h4]
Add [BO] to social checks involving large groups of listeners.
Can be heard clearly at considerable range.

entries.name: Leviathan Power Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Leviathan Power Armor[h3] Please see page 109 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 109 - Strongholds of Resistance[h4]
Includes a built-in respirator
Includes a built-in Mini-Torpedo Launcher
Includes a built-in DF-D1 Duo-Flechette Rifle
Reduces the difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects extreme cold by one. Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to checks due to extreme cold.
Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to all Perception, Vigilance, and combat skill checks due to darkness, smoke, or other environmental effects that obscure vision.

entries.name: Armure Mandalorienne
entries.description:
Toutes les armures mandaloriennes possède un comlink intégré et sont hermétiques au vide. Chaque armure est souvent hautement personnalisée pour correspondre totalement au style de combat de son propriétaire.

Page 50 du livre No Disintegrations ou p57 Collapse of the Republic pour plus de détails.

entries.name: Mechanic's Utility Suit
entries.description:
[H3]Mechanic's Utility Suit[h3] Please see page 48 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Special Modifications[h4]
Counts as having a tool kit.

entries.name: Mimetic Suit
entries.description:
[H3]Mimetic Suit[h3]
      Please see page 47 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Fly Casual[h4]

entries.name: Mk I Katarn-Class Commando Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Mk I [I]Katarn[i] -Class Commando Armor[h3] Please see page 47 of the Knights of Fate Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Knights of Fate[h4]
Suit provides all benefits of a combat scanner
Suit provides all benefits of a breath mask
Increases Encumbrance Threshold by 3 Mod - Increase Encumbrance Threshold by 3

entries.name: Mk I Nightstalker Suit
entries.description:
[H3]Bantin Corp Mk I Nightstalker Suit[h3]
      Please see page 41 of the Cyphers and Masks Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 41 - Cyphers and Masks[h4]

entries.name: Mk II "Hotspot" Insulated Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Mk II "Hotspot" Insulated Armor[h3] Please see page 57 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 57 - Rise of the Separatists[h4]
Comes with built-in comlink.
Adds [BO][BO] to checks to avoid adverse effects of extreme heat or toxic gas.
Attackers must spend one additional [AD] to activate Burn quality and treat rating as one less.

entries.id: Mk IX Personal Mimetic Concealment Suit
entries.name: Mk IX Personal Mimetic Concealment Suit
entries.description:
[H3]Cyricept Mk IX Personal Mimetic Concealment Suit[h3] Please see page 42 of the Cyphers and Masks Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 42 - Cyphers and Masks[h4]
GM may spend [TH][TH][TH] or [DE] to cause the power pack to run out.

entries.name: Mk. III Flak Vest
entries.description:
[H3]Mk. III Flak Vest[h3] Please see page 49 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Dangerous Covenants[h4]
Add +1 Soak against damage from the Blast quality.

entries.name: Mk.II "Steelskin" Anti-Concussive Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Loronar Coporation Mk.II "Steelskin" Anti-Concussive Armor[h3] Please see page 49 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Dangerous Covenants[h4]
Reduce the duration of disoriented or staggered condition by 1 round.

entries.name: Mk.IV Riot Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Creshaldyne Mk.IV Riot Armor[h3] Please see page 44 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 44 - Far Horizons[h4]
Built-in breath mask
Reduce duration of disoriented or staggered results by one round (minimum of one round).

entries.name: N-57 Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Merr-Sonn N-57 Armor[h3] Please see page 48 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Special Modifications[h4]
As a maneuver, may recharge energy weapon that has run out of ammo.

entries.name: Noble Regalia
entries.description:
[H3]Noble Regalia[h3] Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Desperate Allies[h4]
Downgrade difficulty of social checks to interact with nobility or subordinates once.

entries.name: Nomad Greatcoat
entries.description:
[H3]Nomad Greatcoat[h3] Please see page 99 of the Suns of Fortune Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 99 - Suns of Fortune[h4]
Reduces difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects of extreme cold by 1
Removes [SETBACK] added to checks due to extreme cold

entries.name: P-14 Hazardous Industry Suit
entries.description:
[H3]SoroSuub P-14 Hazardous Industry Suit[h3] Please see page 48 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Special Modifications[h4]
Counts as wearing a breath mask.
Add [BO][BO] to [B]Resilience checks[b] to resist heat, cold, radiation, or other hostile environmental conditions.
Wearer does not suffer effects of Burn or Disorient qualities.
When suffering strain to take an extra maneuver, suffer 1 additional strain.

entries.name: PX-11 "Battlement" Powered Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Arakyd Industries PX-11 "Battlement" Powered Armor[h3] Please see page 51 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 51 - Dangerous Covenants[h4]
Remove [SETBACK][SETBACK] from Perception, Vigilance, and combat checks imposed by darkness, smoke, or similar environmental factors that obscure vision.

entries.name: Armure Matelassée
entries.description: Parcourues de solides fibres anti-énergie, les armures matelassées sont utilisées par les hommes de l'Alliance Rebelle et par de nombreuses forces de l'ordre planétaires. Epaisses et résistantes aux chocs, elles offrent une bonne protection lors des combats à mains nues et sont capables d'absorber une partie des décharges d'énergie des blasters. En revanche, elles sont presque inutiles contre les impacts directs de ces derniers. Les armures matelassées sont également confortables et plutôt discrètes. Elles n'attirent presque jamais l'attention sur les planètes de la Bordure.

entries.name: Performer's Attire
entries.description:
[H3]Performer's Attire[h3] Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Desperate Allies[h4]
Add [BO] to checks to perform or attract attention.

entries.name: Bouclier Déflecteur Individuel
entries.description:
Bien qu'ils soient volumineux, rares et difficiles à utiliser, les boucliers déflecteurs individuels sont l'une des seules protections à vraiment pouvoir s'opposer aux rafales des blasters. Ces appareils génèrent un champ de particules capable de dévier ou d'arrêter n'importe quelle décharge. S'ils sont délicats à employer, c'est parce qu'ils demandent énormément d'énergie et qu'ils ne fonctionnent que pendant très peu de temps. En dépensant un [FA], le MJ peut à tout moment les faire tomber à court d'énergie pour le reste de l'affrontement.

Les boucliers ont assez d'énergie pour rester activés 10 minutes. Pour les recharger, il faut ensuite les brancher 3 heures sur une source d'électricité.

Aucune entreprise dans la galaxie n'est connue pour en produire. Fabriquer un bouclier déflecteur individuel dont les radiations ne sont pas mortelles pour celui qui s'en sert relève du tour de force. Ces dispositifs sont de fait très rares et presque toujours de confection artisanale.

entries.name: Phase I ARC Trooper Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Phase I ARC Trooper Armor[h3] Please see page 48 of the Knights of Fate Sourcebook, or page 58 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook, for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 48 - Knights of Fate[h4][H4]Page 58 - Rise of the Separatists[h4]
Provides all benefits of a hardened comlink
Increases Encumbrance Threshold by 3 Mod - Increase Encumbrance Threshold by 3

entries.name: Phase I Clone Trooper Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Phase I Clone Trooper Armor[h3] Please see page 58 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook, for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 58 - Rise of the Separatists[h4]
Provides all benefits of a comlink
Wearer suffers [SE] to Coordination checks until acclimated to armor.

entries.name: Pioneer Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Pioneer Armor[h3] Please see page 43 of the Fully Operational Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 43 - Fully Operational[h4]
Increases Encumbrance Threshold Mod - Increase Encumbrance Threshold by 1 Compte 3

entries.name: Pit Crew Coveralls
entries.description:
[H3]Pit Crew Coveralls[h3] Please see page 44 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 44 - Endless Vigil[h4]
Reduce damage from fires and weapons with the Burn quality by 1.
Increases Encumbrance Threshold Mod - Increase Encumbrance Threshold by 1

entries.name: Polis Masson Bodysuit
entries.description:
[H3]Polis Masson Bodysuit[h3] Please see page 109 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 109 - Strongholds of Resistance[h4]
Includes a head-mounted multidirectional glow rod.
Increases Encumbrance Threshold Mod - Increase Encumbrance Threshold by 1

entries.name: Powered Capacitive Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Powered Capacitive Armor[h3] Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Desperate Allies[h4]
As maneuver, power up and add +1 defense and +1 soak, but lose free maneuver.

entries.name: Protector 1 Combat Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Taggeco Protector 1 Combat Armor[h3]
      Please see page 49 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Dangerous Covenants[h4]

entries.name: Rebel Heavy Battle Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Rebel Heavy Battle Armor[h3] Please see page 50 of the Forged in Battle Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 50 - Forged in Battle[h4]
Equipped with a helmet-fitted breath mask and respirator.

entries.name: Reflect Body Glove
entries.description:
[H3]Reflect Body Glove[h3] Please see page 46 of the Disciples of Harmony Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 46 - Disciples of Harmony[h4]
Add [SE][SE] to Vigilance and Perception checks to notice the body glove.
After each successful combat check against wearer is resolved, reduce Soak by 1, to a minimum of 0.
Original Soak value may be restored by making a successful [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b].

entries.name: Reinforced Environment Gear
entries.description:
[H3]Reinforced Environment Gear[h3] Please see page 44 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 44 - Far Horizons[h4]
Removes [SETBACK] imposed by environmental conditions.
Add [BOOST] to Resilience checks to resist toxic atmospheres or airborne toxins.

entries.name: Resplendent Robes
entries.description:
[H3]Resplendent Robes[h3] Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Desperate Allies[h4]
If wearer draws attention to himself, allies in medium range add [BO] to Perception, Skulduggery, and Stealth checks.

entries.name: Riot Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Riot Armor[h3]
      Please see page 49 of the Keeping the Peace Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Keeping the Peace[h4]

entries.name: Sakiyan Shadowsuit
entries.description:
[H3]Sakiyan Shadowsuit[h3]
      Please see page 105 of the Lords of Nal Hutta Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 105 - Lords of Nal Hutta[h4]

entries.name: Scavenged Clone Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Scavenged Clone Armor[h3] Please see page 58 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook, for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 58 - Rise of the Separatists[h4]
Wearer may suffers [SE] or more on interactions with Republic officials and representatives.

entries.name: SeaScape Diving Suit
entries.description:
[H3]SeaScape Diving Suit[h3] Please see page 46 of the Disciples of Harmony Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 46 - Disciples of Harmony[h4]
Wearer does not suffer movement penalties for traveling through water.

entries.name: Second Skin Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Second Skin Armor[h3] Please see page 49 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 49 - Desperate Allies[h4]
Add [SE][SE] to Perception checks to notice second skin armor on the wearer.

entries.name: Sith Pain Harness
entries.description:
[H3]Sith Pain Harness[h3] Please see page 51 of the Unlimited Power Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 51 - Unlimited Power[h4]
Wearer may suffer 1 wound as incidental to add [SU] to next Discipline check that round. Must suffer 1 Conflict.

entries.name: Skakoan Pressure Suit
entries.description:
[H3]Skakoan Pressure Suit[h3] Please see page 23 of the Fully Operational Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 23 - Fully Operational[h4]
Allows Skakoans to breath in non-methane atmospheres.
Cannot acquire unless on Skako.

entries.name: Smuggler's Trenchcoat
entries.description:
[H3]Smuggler's Trenchcoat[h3] Please see page 47 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 47 - Fly Casual[h4]
Checks to find anything hidden within a smuggler's trenchcoat are opposed by the Skulduggery of the wearer.
The coat can conceal up to 2 encumbrance worth of items.

entries.name: Survivalist Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Creshaldyne Survivalist Armor[h3] Please see page 45 of the Savage Spirits Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 45 - Savage Spirits[h4]
Increases Encumbrance Threshold Mod - Increase Encumbrance Threshold by 1

entries.name: TX-3 Combat Flight Suit
entries.description:
[H3]TX-3 Combat Flight Suit[h3] Please see page 99 of the Suns of Fortune Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 99 - Suns of Fortune[h4]
May survive up to 24 hours in a vacuum

entries.name: Tailored Armored Jacket
entries.description:
[H3]Tailored Armored Jacket[h3] Please see page 44 of the Far Horizons Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 44 - Far Horizons[h4]
Add [ADVANTAGE] to any successful Charm, Deception, or Negotation checks.

entries.name: Timber Cuirass
entries.description:
[H3]Sith Pain Harness[h3]
      Please see page 51 of the Unlimited Power Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 51 - Unlimited Power[h4]

entries.name: Type III "Berethron" Personal Modular Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Type III "Berethron" Personal Modular Armor[h3]
      Please see page 99 of the Suns of Fortune Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 99 - Suns of Fortune[h4]

entries.name: Verpine Fiber Ultramesh Armor
entries.description:
[H3]Verpine Fiber Ultramesh Armor[h3] Please see page 109 of the Strongholds of Resistance Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 109 - Strongholds of Resistance[h4]
Armor may be powered up/down as a maneuver. While powered up, gain +2 defenses. [AD][AD] or [TR] from hostile Combat check can cause armor to run out of power. Cannot be powered up again until end of encounter.

entries.name: Waterweave
entries.description:
[H3]Waterweave[h3] Please see page 51 of the Unlimited Power Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 51 - Unlimited Power[h4]
When submerged, encumbrance changes to 0.

entries.name: Zephyr Stealth Suit
entries.description:
[H3]Zephyr Stealth Suit[h3]
      Please see page 44 of the Endless Vigil Sourcebook for details.[P][H3]Sources:[h3][H4]Page 44 - Endless Vigil[h4]
